mapper.select: SELECT ST.SIGN_TYPE_NAME , SI.SIGN_TITLE , EI.EMP_INFO_NAME , SI.SIGN_WDAT , SI.SIGN_EDAT FROM SIGN SI JOIN EMP_INFO EI ON (EI.EMP_INFO_EMP_NO = SI.SIGN_EMP_CODE) JOIN SIGN_TYPE ST ON (ST.SIGN_TYPE_CODE = SI.SIGN_TYPE_CODE) WHERE SI.SIGN_EMP_CODE = '199207220001' ORDER BY SI.SIGN_CODE DESC
